name: wdpa_iucn_cat_202406
title: Protected Areas (IUCN Categories) - June 2024
description: The World Database on Protected Areas (WDPA) is the most comprehensive global database of marine and terrestrial protected areas. Dataset downloaded June 2024. This is a categorical raster indicating the IUCN category (or relevant information when no category exists) of the protected area covering each pixel.
details: Features which had different IUCN categories and overlapped with each other were assigned a new category (represented by 'mix') during the rasterization process.

extract_types_info.categorical: IUCN category (or relevant information when no category exists). Note: provides 12 category columns in total.
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: IUCN and UNEP-WCMC (2016), The World Database on Protected Areas (WDPA) [On-line], [June 2024], Cambridge, UK: UNEP-WCMC. Available at: www.protectedplanet.net.
